Detailed Description
Experimental packers, that counts number of used bits for serialization.
Effective for values that hover close to zero.

static short Photon.Compression.PrimitivePackBitsExt.ReadSignedPackedBits (this uint buffer, ref int bitposition, int bits)[static]
EXPERIMENTAL: Primary Read packed signed value.
ZigZag is employed to move the sign to the rightmost position. Packed values work best for serializing fields that have a large possible range, but are mostly hover closer to zero in value.
